banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: Strategies for fuel-efficient space travel

nodes.whoTheyAre: With an eduation in computing science, Erika Debenedictis mines for ways to make space travel more efficent. Debenedictis became the winner of the Intel Science Talent Search in 2010 for her ingenious research on the Interplanetary Transit network. Her work documents how the network can be used to lower fuel requirements for space missions.

videoData.description: A manned mission to Mars has long captivated our collective imagination. Perhaps the most significant obstacle to achieving this mission is fueling a craft to and from Mars. Erika Debenedictis offers some compelling theories on how we can make it happen.
videoData.socialDescription: A manned mission to Mars has long captivated our collective imagination. Perhaps the most significant obstacle to achieving this mission is fueling a craft to and from Mars. Erika Debenedictis offers some compelling theories on how we can make it happen.
